description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

This apartment is located on Manhattan, upper west side (close to the north west corner of central park). You are only one block from Central Park and many Restaurants and Markets. 20 min walking distance to The Natural History Museum.  
Cathedral of Saint John the Divine and Columbia University main campus are only few min walking distance away.

This charming unit has one queen size bed and one king size bed, with closets plus a folding bed.
The apartment has high-speed wireless Internet. The apt comes with fresh sheets and towels as part of the small cleaning fee.
This is a very nice apartment, with some pieces of furniture. I expect anyone staying here to be neat, caring and very courteous of my things. Thank you

You are Very close to a number of buses (M3 Bus, M4 Bus, M7 Bus, M116 Bus and M111 Bus). Two min walking distance to the subway (B and C ). 5 min walking to subway 1, 2 and3.
name: Manhattan Upper West Side 1 BR by Central Park
